name: AP Exam Fee Reductions
description: $37 College Board fee reduction per exam (schools forgo $9 rebate); final cost typically $53-62 per exam (down from $99); some CA districts provide additional funding bringing cost to $0
fullDescription: The College Board offers significant fee reductions on AP (Advanced Placement) exams for students with demonstrated financial need.
whatTheyOffer:
- $37 College Board fee reduction per AP exam
- Schools forgo $9 rebate, adding to the reduction
- Final cost typically $53-62 per exam (down from $99)
- Some California districts provide additional funding
- Some students pay $0 for exams in participating districts
howToGetIt:
1. Must demonstrate financial need (qualify for free/reduced lunch, etc.)
2. Talk to your AP teacher or school counselor
3. School will verify eligibility
4. Fee reduction automatically applied at registration
5. Pay reduced fee by deadline
